short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple OSINT tool for searching info based on selected text (select 2 or 3 words) i.e. name, optional nickname, and surname

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on automatically makes links for searching with a name and surname (or optionally first name, nickname and surname) with different methods. It also makes links for probable logins made with the selected 2 or 3 words. With this add-on, searching sites with just a name is made easier.
